titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 395) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1988, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-466.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 236 - 177 (Record Vote No: 453).

bill.summary: 12/2/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 395 (continuing appropriations).
